name: Interpol: The Trail of Dr. Chaos
name_original: Interpol: The Trail of Dr. Chaos
description:
Track down the evil and destructive fugitive Dr. Chaos, as you hunt down clues in this exciting seek and find game. As an elite agent for Interpol, it is your mission to eradicate his trail of corruption as it takes you around the world from one international city to the next. Use your investigative skills to quickly gather the evidence needed to bring him to justice.

• Tons of Puzzles – Analyze elaborate crime scenes to uncover hundreds of mysterious hidden objects.
• Glamorous Destinations – Search for clues scattered in exotic locales around the world including San Francisco, Paris, Tokyo, Cairo and more.
• Clever Mini-games - Discover bonus similarities and differences puzzles to test your keen eye-sight.
• 4 Player Co-op – Complete missions with other agents to quickly apprehend this dangerous criminal before he does more harm.
